segments.en: Linked Discourses 14
2. The Second Chapter
16. With Verses
At Sāvatthī.
“Mendicants, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element.
Those who have a bad attitude come together and converge with those who have a bad attitude.

segments.pli: Atītampi kho, bhikkhave, addhānaṃ dhātusova sattā saṃsandiṃsu samiṃsu.
segments.en: In the past …

segments.pli: Anāgatampi kho, bhikkhave, addhānaṃ dhātusova sattā saṃsandissanti samessanti.
segments.en: In the future …

segments.pli: Etarahipi kho, bhikkhave, paccuppannaṃ addhānaṃ dhātusova sattā saṃsandanti samenti.
segments.en: At present, too, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element.
Those who have a bad attitude come together and converge with those who have a bad attitude.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gūtho gūthena saṃsandati sameti;
segments.en: It’s like how dung comes together with dung,
urine with urine,
spit with spit,
pus with pus,
and blood with blood.

segments.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, dhātusova sattā saṃsandanti samenti.
segments.en: In the same way, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element.
Those who have a bad attitude come together and converge with those who have a bad attitude.
In the past …
In the future …

segments.pli: etarahipi kho paccuppannaṃ addhānaṃ dhātusova sattā saṃsandanti samenti.
segments.en: At present, too, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element.
Those who have a bad attitude come together and converge with those who have a bad attitude.
Sentient beings come together and converge because of an element.
Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.

segments.pli: Atītampi kho, bhikkhave, addhānaṃ dhātusova sattā saṃsandiṃsu samiṃsu.
segments.en: In the past …
In the future …

segments.pli: etarahipi kho, bhikkhave, paccuppannaṃ addhānaṃ dhātusova sattā saṃsandanti samenti.
segments.en: At present, too, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element.
Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, khīraṃ khīrena saṃsandati sameti;
segments.en: It’s like how milk comes together with milk,
oil with oil,
ghee with ghee,
honey with honey,
and molasses with molasses.

segments.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, dhātusova sattā saṃsandanti samenti.
segments.en: In the same way, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element.
Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.
In the past …
In the future …

segments.pli: etarahipi kho paccuppannaṃ addhānaṃ dhātusova sattā saṃsandanti samenti.
segments.en: At present, too, sentient beings come together and converge because of an element.
Those who have a good attitude come together and converge with those who have a good attitude.”
That is what the Buddha said.

segments.pli: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā:
segments.en: Then the Holy One, the Teacher, went on to say:
“Socializing promotes entanglement;
they’re cut off by being aloof.
If you’re lost in the middle of a great sea,
and you clamber up on a little log, you’ll sink.
So too, a person who lives well
sinks by relying on a lazy person.
Hence you should avoid such
a lazy person who lacks energy.
Dwell with the noble ones
who are secluded and determined
and always energetic;
the astute who practice absorption.”

suttaplex.blurb: People of poor character associate together, while people of good character associate together. Illustrated with similes and verses.
